text: Vonda Shepard (July 7, 1963) is an American musician. She performs pop and rock music. She appeared in the television show Ally McBeal as a resident performer. She also plays piano and bass. Shepard was born in New York City. She moved to California during her childhood. title: Vonda Shepard
